Securely manage all your accounts and passwords
Website: https://www.easypass.tech
Email: easypass.inc@gmail.com

[Main Features]
All passwords are generated by one-click, encrypted transmission, cloud synchronization. Only 0.01 USD everyday to keep account and password safe. Free for 30 days.

[The main purpose]
The APP is mainly used to help user to manage account and passwords. Users can quickly generate and query their own passwords through this app, thus effectively avoiding the risk of being hacked. At the same time, the APP also supports data synchronization between different terminals, allowing users to check the extremely fast password management.

[Security, EasyPass promises]
1. All data is encrypted and transmitted and saved using the master password and AES algorithm.
2. EasyPass will not transfer the master password under any circumstances.
3. No one can decrypt user data without a master password.
4. The EasyPass App saves an encrypted data locally, so users can get their own data even when there is no network.
